support.title: Support Center
support.using_assistant_description: Our intelligent assistant allows you to chat in real-time, use voice input, and even switch between multiple assistants tailored to your needs. You can also upload files directly inside the chat for more personalized responses.
support.knowledgebase_description: The knowledge base is a central hub for your organization's important files and documents. Only organization admins can upload files here, ensuring your data is accurate, secure, and well-managed.
support.chat_history_description: Users can view their entire chat history, delete conversations they no longer need, and download a copy of their data for personal use.
support.data_privacy_description: We strictly comply with all EU GDPR regulations. This means your personal data and chat history are handled with the highest privacy standards. You are always in control of your data, with options to download or delete it at any time.
